GK19nkalivxu:0: na bhetavyam+ na boddhavyam+ & na śrāvyam+ vādinas+ vacaḥ |
GK19nkalivxu:3: hāsas+ rājñas+ stavas+ ca+ iti & pañca+ ete jaya+hetavas+ || NKv_2 ||
GK19nkalivxu:6: paṇḍitas+ yadi tatra+ eva & pakṣa+pātas+ adhiropyatām || NKv_3 ||
GK19nkalivxu:7: lobhas+ hetus+ dhanam+ sādhyam+ & dṛṣṭāntas+ tu purohitas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:8: ātmotkarṣas+ nigamanam & anumāneṣu+ ayam+ vidhis+ || NKv_4 ||
GK19nkalivxu:10: jigīṣunā hriyam+ tyaktvā & kāryas+ kolāhalas+ mahān || NKv_5 ||
GK19nkalivxu:12: evam ca tathya+vyutpattis+ & āyuṣas+ ante bhavet+ na vā || NKv_6 ||
GK19nkalivxu:14: na stauti cet+ svayam+ ca svam+ & kadā tasya+ astu nirvṛtis+ || NKv_7 ||
GK19nkalivxu:15: vācyatām+ samayas+ atītas+& spaṣṭam+ agre bhaviṣyati |
GK19nkalivxu:16: iti pāṭhayatām+ granthe& kāṭhinyam+ kutra vartate || NKv_8 ||
GK19nkalivxu:18: trayas+ śiṣya+guṇās+ hi+ ete& mūrkha+ācāryasya bhāgya+jās+ || NKv_9 ||
GK19nkalivxu:19: yadi na kva+ api vidyāyāṃ& sarvathā kramate matis+ |
GK19nkalivxu:20: māntrikās tu bhaviṣyāmas+ & yoginas+ yatayas+ api vā || NKv_10 ||
GK19nkalivxu:22: vilambe karma+bāhulyaṃ& vikhyāpya+ avāpyate dhanam || NKv_11 ||
GK19nkalivxu:23: sukham+ sukhiṣu duḥkhe+ api& jīvanam+ duḥkha+śāliṣu %em: sukhe sukhiṣu |
GK19nkalivxu:24: anugrahāyate yeṣāṃ& te dhanyās+ khalu māntrikās+ || NKv_12 ||
GK19nkalivxu:25: yāvat+ ajñānatas+ maunam+& ācāras+ vā vilakṣaṇas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:27: cārān vicārya daivajñais+& vaktavyam+ bhūbhujām+ phalam |
GK19nkalivxu:29: putras+ iti+ eva pitari& kanyakā+ iti+ eva mātari |
GK19nkalivxu:30: garbha+praśneṣu kathayan& daivajñas+ vijayī bhavet || NKv_15 ||
GK19nkalivxu:31: āyus+praśne dīrgham āyus+& vācyam+ mauhūrtikais+ janais+ |
GK19nkalivxu:32: jīvantas+ bahumanyante& mṛtās+ prakṣyanti kam+ punas+ || NKv_16 ||
GK19nkalivxu:34: sarvam+ vyāmiśram iva ca& vaktavyam+ daiva+cintakais+ || NKv_17 ||
GK19nkalivxu:36: bruvāṇās+ sarvathā grāhyā& lokais+ jyautiṣikās+ janās+ || NKv_18 ||
GK19nkalivxu:37: śatasya lābhe tāmbūlaṃ& sahasrasya tu bhojanam |
GK19nkalivxu:40: deśas+ hi+ aratni+mātre+ api& nāsti daivajña+varjitas+ || NKv_20 ||
GK19nkalivxu:41: vārān ke cit+ grahān ke cit+& ke cit+ ṛkṣāṇi jānate |
GK19nkalivxu:42: tritayam+ ye vijānanti& te vācas+patayas+ svayam || NKv_21 ||
GK19nkalivxu:44: nisarga+śatravas+ sṛṣṭās+ & daivajñānām+ amī trayas+ || NKv_22 ||
GK19nkalivxu:45: svasthais+ asādhya+rogais+ ca& jantubhis+ na+ asti kim+ cana |
GK19nkalivxu:46: kātarās+ dīrgha+rogās+ ca& bhiṣajām+ bhāgya+hetavas+ || NKv_23 ||
GK19nkalivxu:47: na+ atidhairyam+ pradātavyaṃ& na+ atibhītis+ ca rogiṇi |
GK19nkalivxu:48: naiścintyāt+ na+ ādime dānaṃ& nairāśyāt+ eva na+ antime || NKv_24 ||
GK19nkalivxu:49: bhaiṣajyam+ tu yathākāmaṃ& pathyam+ tu kaṭhinam+ vadet |
GK19nkalivxu:52: sarvam api+ upadekṣyanti& rogiṇas+ sadane striyas+ || NKv_26 ||
GK19nkalivxu:56: bahumāna+artham ante ca& jihīrṣanti cikitsakās+ || NKv_28 ||
GK19nkalivxu:58: dāyādās+ saṃprarohanti& daivajñās+ māntrikās+ api || NKv_29 ||
GK19nkalivxu:59: rogasya+ upakrame sāntvaṃ& madhye kim+ cit+ dhana+vyayas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:60: śanais+ anādaras śāntau& snātas+ vaidyam+ na paśyati || NKv_30 ||
GK19nkalivxu:62: eka+ekam artha+lābhāya& dvi+tri+yogas+ tu durlabhas+ || NKv_31 ||
GK19nkalivxu:63: anṛtam+ cāṭuvādas+ ca& dhana+yogas+ mahān ayam |
GK19nkalivxu:64: satyam+ vaiduṣyam iti+ eṣa& yogas+ dāridrya+kārakas+ || NKv_32 ||
GK19nkalivxu:66: sarvam+ mārjanti kavayah+ śālīnām+ muṣṭi+kiṃkarās+ || NKv_33 ||
GK19nkalivxu:67: na kāraṇam apekṣante& kavayas+ stotum udyatās+ |
GK19nkalivxu:68: kim+ cit+ astuvatām teṣām+& jihvā phuraphurāyate || NKv_34 ||
GK19nkalivxu:69: stutam+ stuvanti kavayas+& na svatas+ guṇa+darśinas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:70: kītas+ kas+ cit+ alis+ nāma& kiyatī tatra varṇanā || NKv_35 ||
GK19nkalivxu:71: ekā+ eva kavitā puṃsām+& grāmāya+ aśvāya hastine |
GK19nkalivxu:72: antatas+ annāya vastrāya& tāmbūlāya ca kalpate || NKv_36 ||
GK19nkalivxu:74: vikrīyate katipayais+& vṛthā+ anyais+ viniyujyate || NKv_37 ||
GK19nkalivxu:75: varṇayanti nara+ābhāsān+& vāṇīm+ labdhvā+ api ye janās+ |
GK19nkalivxu:76: labdhvā+ api kāma+dhenum+ te & lāṅgale viniyuñjate || NKv_38 ||
GK19nkalivxu:79: yat+ sandarbhe yat+ ullekhe & yat+ vyaṅgye nibhṛtam+ manas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:80: samādhes+ api tat+ jyāyās+ & śaṃkaras+ yadi varṇyate % 40 || NKv_40 ||
GK19nkalivxu:82: gṛhiṇī bhaginī tasyās+ & śvaśurau śyālas+ iti+ api |
GK19nkalivxu:83: prāṇinām kalinā sṛṣṭās+ & pañca prāṇās+ ime+ apare || NKv_41 ||
GK19nkalivxu:85: ajñātās+ eva gṛhiṇām+ & bhakṣayanti+ ākhu+vat+ gṛhe || NKv_42 ||
GK19nkalivxu:86: mātulasya balam+ mātā & jāmātus+ duhitā balam |
GK19nkalivxu:87: śvaśurasya balam+ bhāryā & svayam eva+ atithes+ balam || NKv_43 ||
GK19nkalivxu:88: jāmātus+ vakratā tāvat+& yāvat+ śyālasya bālatā |
GK19nkalivxu:89: prabudhyamāne sāralyam+ & prabuddhe+ asmin+ palāyanam || NKv_44 ||
GK19nkalivxu:90: bhāryā jyeṣṭhā śiśus+ śyālas+ & śvaśrūs+ svātantrya+vartinī |
GK19nkalivxu:91: śvaśuras+ tu pravāsī+ iti & jāmātus+ bhāgya+dhoraṇī || NKv_45 ||
GK19nkalivxu:93: sakṛt+ āgatya gacchantī & kanyā nirmārṣṭi mandiram || NKv_46 ||
GK19nkalivxu:95: pati+pakṣyān+ tu bahu+āśān & kṣīra+pān+ taskarān+ api || NKv_47 ||
GK19nkalivxu:97: aśrānta+kalahas+ nāma & yogas+ ayam+ gṛha+medhinām || NKv_48 ||
GK19nkalivxu:98: bhārye dve bahavas+ putrās+& dāridryam+ roga+saṃbhavas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:99: jīrṇau ca mātā+pitarau+& ekaikam+ naraka+adhikam || NKv_49 ||
GK19nkalivxu:101: smṛte sīdanti gātrāṇi & dṛṣṭe prajñā vinaśyati |
GK19nkalivxu:102: aho mahat+ idam+ bhūtam& uttama+ṛṇa+abhiśābdhitam || NKv_50 ||
GK19nkalivxu:103: antakas+ api hi jantūnām& anta+kālam apekṣate |
GK19nkalivxu:104: na kāla+niyamas+ kas+ cit+& uttamārṇasya vidyate || NKv_51 ||
GK19nkalivxu:105: na paśyāmas+ mukhe daṃṣṭrām+ & na pāśam+ vā kara+añjale |
GK19nkalivxu:106: uttamārṇam avekṣya+ eva & tathā+ api+ udvejite manas+ || NKv_52 ||
GK19nkalivxu:109: mṛtyau mṛtyuñjaya+dhyānam+& dāridrye tu na kim+ cana || NKv_53 ||
GK19nkalivxu:110: śaktim+ karoti saṃcāre & śīta+uṣṇe marṣayati+ api |
GK19nkalivxu:111: dīpayati+ udare vahnim+ & dāridryam+ parama+auṣadham || NKv_54 ||
GK19nkalivxu:112: giram+ skhalantīm+ mīlantīm+ & dṛṣṭim+ pādau visaṃsthulau \var{visaṃsthulau\lem \em; visaṃsphuṭau \ed} |
GK19nkalivxu:113: protsāhayati yācñāyām+ & rāja+ājñā+ iva daridratā || NKv_55 ||
GK19nkalivxu:115: ākiṃcanya+bala+āḍhyānām+& antatas+ aśmā+ api jīryati || NKv_56 ||
GK19nkalivxu:116: na+ asya corās+ na piśunās+ & na dāyādās+ na pārthivās+ |
GK19nkalivxu:117: dainyam+ rājyāt+ api jyāyas+ & yadi tattvam+ prabudhyate || NKv_57 ||
GK19nkalivxu:120: protsāhayati dāyādān+ & lākṣmīs+ kim+ cit+ upasthitā || NKv_58 ||
GK19nkalivxu:121: viḍambayanti ye nityam+ & vidagdhān+ dhaninas+ janās+ |
GK19nkalivxu:122: te+ eva tu viḍambyante & śriyā kim+cit+upekṣitās+ || NKv_59 ||
GK19nkalivxu:124: kīṭa+buddhis+ manuṣyeṣu & nūtanāyās+ śriyas+ phalam+ || NKv_60 ||
GK19nkalivxu:125: śṛṇvantas+ eva pṛcchanti & paśyantas+ api na jānate |
GK19nkalivxu:126: viḍambanāni dhanikās+ & stotrāṇi+ iti+ eva manvate || NKv_61 ||
GK19nkalivxu:129: stotavyais+ stūyante nityam+ & sevanīyais+ ca sevyate |
GK19nkalivxu:130: na bibheti na jihreti & tathā+ api dhanikas+ janas+ || NKv_63 ||
GK19nkalivxu:132: lakṣmī+madas+ tu mūrkhāṇām+ & ā+deham+ anuvartate || NKv_64 ||
GK19nkalivxu:133: śrīs+ māsam+ ardha+māsam+ vā & ceṣṭitvā vinivartate |
GK19nkalivxu:134: vikāras+ tu tat+ārabdhas+ & nityam+ laśuna+gandha+vat || NKv_65 ||
GK19nkalivxu:135: kaṇṭḥe madas+ kodrava+jas+ & hṛdi tāmbūla+jas+ madas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:136: lakṣmī+madas+ tu sarvāṅge & putra+dāra+mukheṣu+ api || NKv_66 ||
GK19nkalivxu:137: yatra+ āsīt+ asti vā lakṣmīs+ & tatra+ unmadas+ pravartatām |
GK19nkalivxu:138: kule+ api+ avatarati+ eṣa & kuṣṭhā+apasmāra+vat+ katham+ || NKv_67 ||
GK19nkalivxu:140: vismārayanti jātim+ svām+ & varāṭās+ pañcaṣā kare || NKv_68 ||
GK19nkalivxu:141: bibhartu bhṛtyān+ dhanikas+ & dattām+ vā deyam+ arthiṣu |
GK19nkalivxu:142: yāvat+ yācaka+sādharmyam+ & tāvat+ lokas+ na mṛṣyati || NKv_69 ||
GK19nkalivxu:144: dhana+bhāras+ hi lokasya & piśunais+ eva dhāryate |
GK19nkalivxu:145: katham+ te tam+ laghūkartum+ & yatante+ aparathā svatas+ || NKv_70 ||
GK19nkalivxu:147: dvi+guṇam+ tri+guṇam+ ca+ eva+ & kṛta+antas+ lālayiṣyati || NKv_71 ||
GK19nkalivxu:150: na sva+artham+ kim+cit+ icchanti & na preryante ca kena cit |
GK19nkalivxu:151: para+artheṣu pravartante & śaṭhās+ santas+ ca tulya+vat || NKv_73 ||
GK19nkalivxu:152: kāla+antare hi+ anarthāya & gṛdhras+ geha+upari sthitas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:153: khalas+ gṛha+samīpa+sthas+ & sadyas+ anarthāya dehinām || NKv_74 ||
GK19nkalivxu:156: japa+yajñas+ ca yajñeṣu & rocate lobha+śālinām || NKv_75 ||
GK19nkalivxu:157: kim+ vakṣyati+ iva dhanikāt+ & yāvat+ udvijate+ adhanas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:158: kim+ prakṣyati+ iti lubdhas+ api & tāvat+ udvijate tatas+ || NKv_76 ||
GK19nkalivxu:160: bhikṣākabalam+ eka+ekam+ & ye hi paśyanti Meru+vat || NKv_77 ||
GK19nkalivxu:161: dhana+pālas+ piśācas+ hi & datte svāmini+ upasthite |
GK19nkalivxu:162: dhana+lubdhas+ piśācas+ tu & na kasmai cana ditsate || NKv_78 ||
GK19nkalivxu:163: dātāras+ arthibhis+ arthyante & dātṛbhis+ punas+ arthinas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:165: svasmin+ asati na+ arthasya & rakṣakas+ saṃbhavet+ iti |
GK19nkalivxu:166: niścitya+ evam+ svayam+ api & bhuṅkte lubdhas+ katham+ cana || NKv_80 ||
GK19nkalivxu:168: vicitrān+ ullikhet+ vighnān+ & tiṣṭhāsus+ atithis+ ciram+ || NKv_81 ||
GK19nkalivxu:170: pradīyate viduṣi+ ekam+ & kavau daśa naṭe śatam+ |
GK19nkalivxu:171: sahasram+ dāmbhike loke & śrotriye tu na kim+cana || NKv_82 ||
GK19nkalivxu:173: tāvat+ arthās+ prasiddhyanti & yāvat+ cāpalam+ āvṛtam+ || NKv_83 ||
GK19nkalivxu:175: vaktavyam+ kim+ cit+ iti+ uktam+ & vastutas+ tulasī parā || NKv_84 ||
GK19nkalivxu:176: vismṛtam+ vāhaṭena+ idam+ & tulasyās+ paṭhatā guṇan+ |
GK19nkalivxu:179: maunam+ eka+āsikā ca+ iti & mūrkha+saṃjīvanāni ṣaṭ || NKv_86 ||
GK19nkalivxu:180: vāsas+ puṇyeṣu tīrtheṣu & & prasiddhas+ ca mṛtas+ gurus+ |
GK19nkalivxu:183: deśa+dharmas+ tu+ anācāre & pṛcchatām+ siddham+ uttaram+ || NKv_88 ||
GK19nkalivxu:184: yathā jānanti bahavas+ & yathā vakṣyanti dātari |
GK19nkalivxu:185: tathā dharmam+ caret+ sarvam+ & na vṛthā kim+ cit+ ācaret || NKv_89 ||
GK19nkalivxu:186: sadā japa+paṭas+ haste & madhye madhye+ akṣi+mīlanam+ |
GK19nkalivxu:187: sarvam+ brahma+ iti vādas+ ca & sadyas+pratyaya+hetavas+ || NKv_90 ||
GK19nkalivxu:189: satatam+ śuci+veṣas+ ca & iti+ etat+ dambhasya jīvitam+ || NKv_91 ||
GK19nkalivxu:190: tāvat+ dīrgham+ nitya+karma & yāvat+ syāt+ draṣṭṛ+melanam+ |
GK19nkalivxu:191: tāvat+saṃkṣipyate sarvam+ & yāvat+ draṣṭā na vidyate || NKv_92 ||
GK19nkalivxu:193: kim+ tasya sādhanais+ anyais+ & kiṃkarās+ sarva+pārthivās+ || NKv_93 ||
GK19nkalivxu:196: durjanānām+ atas+ nyāyyam+ & dūrāt+ eva visarjanam+ || NKv_94 ||
GK19nkalivxu:199: jyāyān+ asaṃstavas+ duṣṭais+ & īrṣyāyai saṃstavas+ punas+ |
GK19nkalivxu:202: milanti yadi catvāri & tat+ diśe+ api namas+ namas+ || NKv_97 ||
GK19nkalivxu:204: para+marmāsu vācam+ ca & khalānām+ asṛjat+ vidhis+ || NKv_98 ||
GK19nkalivxu:206: Kalinā daśama+aṃśena & sarvas+ kālas+ api dāruṇas+ || NKv_99 ||
GK19nkalivxu:207: yatra bhāryā+giras+ vedās+ & yatra dharmas+ artha+sādhanam+ |
GK19nkalivxu:208: yatra sva+pratibhā mānam+ & tasmai śrī+kalaye namas+ || NKv_100 ||
GK19nkalivxu:209: kāmam+ astu jagat+ sarvam+ & kālasya+ asya vaśaṃvadam+ |
GK19nkalivxu:210: kāla+kālam+ prapannānām+ & kālas+ kim+ nas+ kariṣyati ? || NKv_101 ||
